## toFullWidthString() function

转换为全角字符串。

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function toFullWidthString(value: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string | 要转换的字符串 |

<b>Returns:</b>
